steps.description: Add-Add 1/3 cup cheddar cheese to a microwave-safe cup
steps.modified_description: Add-Add 1/3 cup cheddar cheese to a microwave-safe cup but spill

steps.description: Chop-Chop 1/4 red bell pepper into tiny bits
Place-Place the chopped pepper in the microwave-safe bowl
steps.modified_description: Place-Place the chopped pepper in the microwave-safe bowl but spill

steps.description: Add-Add 1 tablespoons of water to the bowl
steps.modified_description: Add-Add 1 tablespoons of water to the bowl but spill

steps.description: Melt-Melt the cheese by microwaving cup for 30 sec. (Check after 30 seconds and microwave for 10 seconds more if needed).
Mix-Mix the cheese and red bell pepper in the bowl
steps.modified_description: Mix-Mix the cheese and red bell pepper in the bowl but spill

steps.description: add-add 1/2 tbsp softened butter to the bowl
Add-Add 1/4 teaspoon pepper to the bowl
Add-Add 1/4 teaspoon salt to the bowl
Mix-Mix all the ingredients of the bowl well

errors.description: Microwave-Microwave the bowl, covered, for 2 minutes
